entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023
